Explanation: Natural language processing - discipline of AI concerning the analysis and comprehension of human language
Word combination sequences - example of a 3-gram--"quick brown fox"
Term frequency-inverse document frequency - a numerical representation of a term importance per document in a corpus
Single portion of a corpus, in Splunk one event or text field from the event would represent the document
Collection of documents, in Splunk this would be represented by the total events returned on a search
Latent semantic analysis - can be used to reduce dimensionality of a TFIDF by evaluating document and term relationships
